title: Service disruption between Paya Lebar and Bedok

title_translations.zh-Hans: Paya Lebar 和 Bedok 之间的服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan antara Paya Lebar dan Bedok
title_translations.ta: Paya Lebar மற்றும் Bedok இடையே சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: UPDATE:Trains travelling between Paya Lebar and Bedok in both directions are running well again.
Some trains moving slower between Paya Lebar and Bedok in both directions.
